news.Title: [AI Summary] Global Unichip (3443.TW) Benefiting from AI ASIC Orders and Revenue Growth, Stock Price Fluctuations Attract Institutional Attention
news.Content:
Recent news regarding Global Unichip (3443.TW) primarily focuses on its developments in the AI ASIC (Application-Specific Integrated Circuit) sector and its revenue performance. Liberty Times reported that Global Unichip is actively expanding AI ASIC orders, having secured projects from several major North American CSPs (Cloud Service Providers), which are expected to materialize by the end of the year, driving revenue growth next year. Encouraged by this news, Global Unichip's stock price briefly hit the daily limit, reaching a new high in nearly 16 months (Liberty Times). September consolidated revenue reached a record high for a single month, increasing by 30.5% month-over-month and 104.8% year-over-year, with third-quarter consolidated revenue increasing by 41.1% quarter-over-quarter and 30.3% year-over-year (Liberty Times).

However, Global Unichip also faces some challenges. Global Unichip's General Manager, Shang-Yi Dai, stated at the investor conference that due to the increased proportion of mass production, the third-quarter gross profit margin and operating profit margin will decrease by several percentage points compared to the previous quarter (Liberty Times). In addition, due to the increased proportion of the US market and the decreased proportion of the Chinese market, the company is undergoing a period of operational adjustment (Liberty Times).

Hsbc bank raised Global Unichip's target price, citing that CSP CPU project size is larger than expected (UDN Economic Daily). However, institutional investors showed net selling of Global Unichip on some trading days, for example, net selling 522 shares on October 31 (Liberty Times) and 648 shares on November 11 (Liberty Times), indicating differing views among institutional investors regarding its future prospects. Nevertheless, foreign investors remain optimistic about Global Unichip, for example, on November 1, foreign investors had been net buyers for 10 consecutive days, accumulating nearly 5,200 shares (Liberty Times).

Global Unichip is active in the IC design sector, benefiting from trends such as AI and HPC, and its operations are expected to continue to rise (Liberty Times). At the same time, employee salaries are among the highest in listed companies, indicating good company profitability (Liberty Times).
